name: Ceramics
description: Handcrafted ceramic pieces including mugs, bowls, plates and decorative items. Each piece is uniquely created by our skilled artisans.

name: Woodworking
description: Beautiful handcrafted wooden items, from serving boards to decorative pieces. All of our wood products are made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Textiles
description: Handwoven textiles including table linens, throws, wall hangings, and more. Each piece showcases traditional techniques with contemporary design.

name: Jewelry
description: Handcrafted jewelry pieces made with traditional metalsmithing techniques. From delicate earrings to statement necklaces, each piece is unique.

name: Paper Goods
description: Handmade paper products including journals, cards, and art prints. Our paper artisans create beautiful pieces using traditional papermaking and printing techniques.

name: Glass
description: Hand-blown and stained glass pieces created by skilled artisans. From functional vases to decorative suncatchers, each glass piece is uniquely crafted.
